code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{MicIcon,AttachIcon,ThumbsUpIcon,SendIcon}from'../assets/icons';import'../styles/ChatInterface.scss';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChatInterface=()=>{const[inputValue,setInputValue]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(inputValue.trim()){console.log('Sending message:',inputValue);setInputValue('');}};const handleKeyPress=e=>{if(e.key==='Enter'&&!e.shiftKey){e.preventDefault();handleSubmit(e);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-interface",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-interface__input-area",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-interface__input-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"chat-interface__input-field",value:inputValue,onChange:e=>setInputValue(e.target.value),onKeyPress:handleKeyPress,placeholder:"Type your message...",rows:1})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-interface__controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-interface__left-controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-interface__mic-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MicIcon,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-interface__attach-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AttachIcon,{})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-interface__right-controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ThumbsUpIcon,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-interface__send-button",onClick:handleSubmit,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SendIcon,{})})]})]})]})});};export default ChatInterface;
